item.description:
Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club will present this year's Teton Gravity Film (TGR) entitled "Lost and Found" at the "The Place" in Faneuil Hall.

TGR is a touring ski movie (similar to Warren Miller). They host pre-season movie premiere parties all across the county. Thanks to Matt Brodie, our special showing at "The Place" will be FREE for all Wedeln, guests and those interested in membership.

"The Place" is a cool Faneuil Hall bar and we have it reserved for the TGR Movie from 6:30 until 9pm. "The Place" will provide free appetizers. We will allow walk up admission as space allows for $5 per person (Anybody on the VIP list is free). Any money raised from the admission will be donated to ski race scholarships including the Bragan scholarship.

Anyone interested in attending (including members) should email membership@wedeln.com to get on our VIP list. If you are including RSVPs for multiple people please include the guests full name and email.

For directions and info about the bar
http://www.theplacebo...

Movie info
http://www.tetongravi...

Please let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks,
Jonathan
item.name: Wedeln presents Teton Gravity Research's "Lost and Found" at the PLACE
